longBusinessSummary.0: Cholamandalam Financial Holdings Limited, an investment company, provides financial services in India. The company provides vehicle finance, home loans, home equity loans, SME loans, investment advisory and stock broking services, and various other financial services. It also offers accident, engineering, health, liability, marine, motor, property, rural, and travel insurance products for individuals and corporates. The company was formerly known as TI Financial Holdings Limited and changed its name to Cholamandalam Financial Holdings Limited in March 2019. Cholamandalam Financial Holdings Limited was incorporated in 1949 and is based in Chennai, India.
